Package WebScraper

Class TreeImage

java.lang.Object
WebScraper.TreeImage
public class TreeImage extends Object
This class is the actor that will draw the final image after creating all the istances of Node
Version:
1.6.2
Author:
Luca Ciafardoni

    Description
    static int
    calcHeight​(ArrayList<String> lines)
    Calculates tree height by finding the line with the highest amount of tabs (\t), the number of max tabs will be the tree height
    static ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>>
    calcNodesTiles​(ArrayList<String> lines)
    Creates a list with all the x and y tiles coordinate for each line in the corresponding index Example: Codfica: Vespasiano Tito Giulia Flavia Flavia Domiziano Result: [[1,1], [2,1], [3,1], [3,2], [2,2]]
    static ArrayList<Integer>
    calcWidthPerHeight​(ArrayList<String> lines)
    Calculates the width (number of members) for each height level of the tree by calculating the number of tabs (/t) for each line and then adding 1 to the found height depth
    static void

    Calculates all the attribute values and then it creates and saves the image in a folder called "History"

    static void

    For each iteration, g2d performs these actions: 1. draws the rectangle filling it using white color 2. draws the rectangle's borders using black color 3. draws the rectangle's arrows indicating his children.

    • createImage

      public static void createImage​(int cont)
      Calculates all the attribute values and then it creates and saves the image in a folder called "History"
      Parameters:
      cont - starts from 0, specifies the image number in the "History" folder

    • calcHeight

      public static int calcHeight​(ArrayList<String> lines)
      Calculates tree height by finding the line with the highest amount of tabs (\t), the number of max tabs will be the tree height
      Parameters:
      lines - all the lines from codifica
      Returns:
      max_height found after comparing every line

    • calcWidthPerHeight

      public static ArrayList<Integer> calcWidthPerHeight​(ArrayList<String> lines)
      Calculates the width (number of members) for each height level of the tree by calculating the number of tabs (/t) for each line and then adding 1 to the found height depth
      Parameters:
      lines - all the lines from codifica
      Returns:
      an array with all the members for each depth level

    • calcNodesTiles

      public static ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> calcNodesTiles​(ArrayList<String> lines)
      Creates a list with all the x and y tiles coordinate for each line in the corresponding index Example: Codfica: Vespasiano Tito Giulia Flavia Flavia Domiziano Result: [[1,1], [2,1], [3,1], [3,2], [2,2]]
      Parameters:
      lines - all the lines from codifica
      Returns:
      an array with lines coordinates at the corresponding index

    • createNodes

      public static void createNodes​(ArrayList<String> lines)
      Creates the list of nodes to draw using the attributes calculated before, each iteration creates a new Node object
      Parameters:
      lines - all the lines from codifica

    • drawNodes

      public static void drawNodes​(ArrayList<Node> nodes_list, Graphics2D g2d)
      For each iteration, g2d performs these actions: 1. draws the rectangle filling it using white color 2. draws the rectangle's borders using black color 3. draws the rectangle's arrows indicating his children. Starting from the current node index contained in nodes_list, the for cycles looks for the first current node number of children nodes with the following y_tile, since the nodes are organized in the known order this will mean they are current nodes's children. For each match, g2d will draw a line starting from the parent Bottom coordinates to the children Top coordinates 4. draws the text contained in the current node text attribute inside the white rectangle's area and it also calculate the number of text lines, this data will be useful to pick the icons image to draw in the next step 5. draws the icon image next to the names contained in the rectangle
      Parameters:
      nodes_list - list of the tree's nodes
      g2d - the actor object that draws the image

    • setCodifica

      public static void setCodifica​(String s)
      codifica setter method
      Parameters:
      s - The semi-processed String
